Amnesty International: s statements and report: Amnesty International used strong language in their public statements and annual report to accuse Trump of violating and endangering human rights, particularly highlighting his attempt to implement a temporary ban on immigration from certain majority-Muslim countries as a "transparently hateful move." The report also accused Trump of implementing an "anti-rights rhetoric of discrimination and xenophobia" and risking the lives and health of millions of women and girls worldwide.
Washington Press article: A left-wing website reported on February 22 that Amnesty International had "officially declared Trump a human rights violator."
